WorkItem.ClosedComment: can happen even to the best.
WorkItem.Description:
Loading from Armory defaults the model to Holy Priest. Changing to ShadowPriest shows up with a Holy Smite rotation. 
 
Changing the model to shadowpriest, then saving the file and loading the file again (even after starting the executable again) leave the holy smite rotation up.
 
Unlike the HolyPriest model, I see no means of changing the attack model in shadowpriest.
WorkItem.Summary: [ShadowPriest] Starts up with Holy Smite Rotation

Comments.Message: Close this, I logged out with the wrong spec.
